Description: Paraformaldehyde fixation to preserve tissue, often for immunohistochemistry (IHC)
A mixture of single or disaggregated cell suspended in a liquid solution.
A cell suspension sample that has undergone fluorescence-activated cell sorting based on protein expression and cellular composition
Tissue that has not been fixed or preserved
Tissue that has been preserved by freezing at very low temperatures
